data.system_settings: MacBook Air Early 2015, MacOS High Sierra 10.13.4
data.actual_result: Discord greys out mostly, if not completely greyed out, with most things disabled. You can navigate through the quickswitcher
data.expected_result: You see the ping you were sent and cringe as its a random @ everyone.
data.short_description: [macOS SPECIFIC] Clicking a notification whilst watching a linked twitter video embed in fullscreen will DESTROY the client.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a twitter video embed from a twitter link into fullscreen - Have someone ping you in another channel or DM - Click the notification - Mess with your client
